speaker.whotheyare: BCG's Amane Dannouni explores how technology impacts established business models and how digital enablers can unlock greater economic and social value.
speaker.whylisten: Amane Dannouni is a Managing Director and Partner at Boston Consulting Group and a core member of the Technology Advantage practice. He's worked in the BCG Paris, Singapore and Casablanca offices with clients in Europe, Southeast Asia and Africa. During his time in Singapore, he cofounded and led BCG's Digital Transformation Enablement Center for Asia-Pacific. He holds a master's degree in engineering from École Centrale Paris.
